body.p: Usage tips :- Click on the word to lookup it's meaning in a popup which uses library provided by http://www.wordnik.com or in http://www.vocabulary.com which is opened in new browser tab. Alternatively, you can click "ctrl+mouse click" to open the word meaning in http://www.vocabulary.com .

p.span: Speed Test Mode :- Let's you calculate you current reading speed. It
displays result in WPM(Words Per Minute) format.

body.p: Training Mode:- You can use the training mode to increase your reading speed. The main science behind speed reading is that you have to read group of words at once and reduce subvocalization (vocalizing words internally) which considerably slows down reading speed. That means you have to limit your fixations per line to increase your reading speed. In each fixation you have to take in as much words as possible. This will enable you to read in high speed with even better comprehension. This app let's you choose the number of fixations per line and also the fixation interval. The less fixation interval means you are reading faster. Just experiment with the number of fixations, fixation interval, page width and height to find the comfortable settings. At first, as you begin to read group of words at a time and in less fixation interval, you won't comprehend much but with practice you can read more number of words in each fixation and comprehend better.
